sQfQeBk2cVqzIk5fD.name: Judo
sQfQeBk2cVqzIk5fD.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

mFYwZel00uge5Nx7o.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually
mFYwZel00uge5Nx7o.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.
from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else

mM4POIN3aeeANRU8v.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@
mM4POIN3aeeANRU8v.name: People Affected

features.situation: from others aware of your reputation
to others on all Empathy, Body Language, and Psychology rolls to discern your intentions or the truth of your words
to others on IQ, Detect Lies, and Gambling rolls in any Quick Contest with your Acting, Fast-Talk, or Gambling skill when you try to lie or bluff
to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd
to DX for any close manual task, including close combat

tNlP8cG40g4b0i9TT.name: Low Pain Threshold
tNlP8cG40g4b0i9TT.notes: Double the shock from any injury. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture

thK6XX61LHVi3yVkj.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have an opportunity to set a fire
thK6XX61LHVi3yVkj.name: Pyromania

tJsHVlmP6exITHCAv.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with a tempting morsel or good wine that, for some reason, you should resist. If you fail, you partake – regardless of the consequences.
tJsHVlmP6exITHCAv.name: Gluttony

features.situation: toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

tj2xUhA-ktfbdhY7M.name: Curious
tj2xUhA-ktfbdhY7M.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

features.situation: from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)
from others who realize you are a weirdness magnet (except parapsychologists, cultists, conspiracy theorists, thrill-seekers)

t0TuWKSUZOX4Xhq-P.name: Unluckiness
t0TuWKSUZOX4Xhq-P.notes: Once per play session, the GM will arbitrarily and maliciously make something go wrong for you.

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are

tiQFlaD9yVVc3YnML.name: Overconfidence
tiQFlaD9yVVc3YnML.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from others aware of your clueless nature

tGPbdGH3dUMZbQEW0.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act
tGPbdGH3dUMZbQEW0.name: Impulsiveness

t-5nsb6gw6RCsOcxI.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.
t-5nsb6gw6RCsOcxI.name: Post-Combat Shakes

ta7N69aT2D3UNrKC-.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.
ta7N69aT2D3UNrKC-.name: Loner

thTB1X1XT1v9FxIkp.notes: Make a self-control roll in any situation where you could render aid or are specifically asked for help, but should resist the urge
thTB1X1XT1v9FxIkp.name: Charitable

ty5ABBXYEqqEd2mWT.notes: Make a self-control roll each day. If you fail, you must try to trick a dangerous subject: a skilled warrior, a dangerous monster, a whole group of reasonably competent opponents, etc. If you resist, you get a cumulative -1 per day to your self-control roll until you finally fail a roll!
ty5ABBXYEqqEd2mWT.name: Trickster

tyBCBDNhawHWjqnLy.notes: Once adrift in your own thoughts, you must roll against Perception-5 in order to notice any event short of personal physical injury
tyBCBDNhawHWjqnLy.name: Absent-Mindedness

features.situation: to all IQ and IQ-based skill rolls, save those for the task you are currently concentrating on

t3etTcAVT6BspvGau.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!
t3etTcAVT6BspvGau.name: Honesty

thQE-Z6Gkvq3VofKR.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.
thQE-Z6Gkvq3VofKR.name: Greed

mk6cPx7T_9n5dJbhI.notes: @Magical powers in a non-magical world, higher TL equipment, grants special powers or is supernatural@
mk6cPx7T_9n5dJbhI.name: Special Abilities

tD1wiQmdq7S8WvlMt.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

features.situation: on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning

turLlWhRs5c4F_yGp.name: High Pain Threshold

to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial

to initiative rolls for your side (+2 if you are the leader)
